intro: Zuloagocardamum, commonly known as the Zuloaga cardamum, is a species of flowering plant native to specific regions in South America. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes a variety of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its small, fragrant flowers and leathery leaves. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in cloud forests. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
